Enhance Theme Persistence with Local Storage in Roadmap üé®
items.summary: This update replaces the unreliable cookie-based theme persistence with a more robust solution using localStorage and sessionStorage. The theme will now persist across page refreshes and sync across tabs, ensuring a seamless user experience. Key changes include the removal of cookie logic and the introduction of a more reliable storage mechanism.

items.title: Fix nano error in Nexior üöÄ
items.summary: This update introduces a patch to resolve the nano error issue. A new JSON configuration file has been added, and modifications have been made to the ResolutionSelector and Preview components to reflect the changes in model handling. These adjustments enhance the overall functionality and user experience in the Nexior application.

items.title: Fix nano image error in Nexior üöÄ
items.summary: This update addresses a critical error related to nano image processing. Key changes include modifications to several components, such as the ImagePreview and ModelSelector, enhancing functionality and user experience. Additionally, various internationalization files have been updated to improve language support across multiple locales.
